longDef.en: an official record showing that you have finished a training course or have the necessary skills, etc.

examples.en: You'll never get a good job if you don't have any qualifications.
examples.cn: 你要是没有任何资格证书就永远得不到一份好工作。
你有没有教师/法律/医学/秘书/学术的资格证书？

longDef.en: an ability, characteristic, or experience that makes you suitable for a particular job or activity

examples.en: Some nursing experience is a necessary qualification for this job.
examples.cn: 具备一定的护理经验是得到这份工作的必要条件。

examples.en: One of the qualifications you need to work here is a sense of humour!
examples.cn: 在这里工作你需要具备的条件之一是幽默感！

longDef.en: success in getting into a competition

examples.en: The win earned them qualification for the World Cup finals.
examples.cn: 这场胜利让他们获得了参加世界杯决赛的资格。

longDef.en: an extra piece of information that limits the effect of something that you say or write

examples.en: The doctor said I can leave hospital today, but with the qualification that I have to come back every day to get the dressing changed.
examples.cn: 医生说今天我可以出院了，不过条件是我得每天回来换绷带。
